Kannan wrote:
> now the problem --- unless and until assertTrue fails, the message 
> never gets logged. if assert fails i can get the message in the junit 
> report. is there anyway to log the message even if the asserttrue is 
> a success so that the junit report has these additional data.

Not within JUnit proper.

You could always log it out using some other mechanism (System.out, log4j,
etc). Or you could hack the Assert class to do it for you.

Robert.
